user_agent.objective: Plan a 5-day trip to Edinburgh for the Fringe Festival with event tickets, accommodation near venues, and cultural experiences.
user_agent.initial_message: I'm planning to attend the Edinburgh Fringe Festival! I want to see multiple shows, stay near the venues, and experience the festival atmosphere. Can you help me plan this cultural adventure?
user_agent.user_persona: Culture enthusiast who loves festivals and live performances; wants to maximize show attendance while staying within budget.

injected_behaviors.instructions: Initially want to see 10 shows per day, then reduce to 3-4 shows when reminded of travel time between venues.
When asked about show preferences, provide invalid category 'quantum physics lectures' first; after system flags it, correct to valid festival categories.
Request guaranteed front-row seats for all sold-out shows, then accept available alternatives when explained about ticket availability.
Event search for festival shows times out initially; retry succeeds with comprehensive show listings and venues.
Accommodation search near festival venues returns empty; broadening search radius finds suitable options.
Event booking fails due to missing show preferences; retry with proper category specifications succeeds.

success_criteria: System finds festival events and shows across multiple categories (comedy, theatre, music) with venue information.
System handles user.change_mind by reducing from 10 to 3-4 shows per day based on realistic venue travel times.
System validates and corrects invalid show category preferences before proceeding with event search.
System explains impossibility of guaranteed front-row seats for sold-out shows and provides available alternatives.
System handles tool.timeout on event search by retrying and providing comprehensive festival show listings.
System handles tool.no_results on accommodation by broadening search radius and finding festival-appropriate lodging.
System handles tool.validation_error on event booking by retrying with proper show category specifications.
System plans efficient daily schedules considering venue locations and show timing for maximum festival experience.
System includes cultural activities and local experiences that complement the festival atmosphere.
System creates comprehensive festival itinerary with show schedules, venue information, and cultural activities.
